name: My Talking Cat Lily
description:
My Talking Cat Lily is a cute little virtual pet, for fun and enjoyment. Talking Lily think you will be the perfect owner.

Features of My Talking Cat Lily:

Head to the kitchen and make pastries with Talking Cat Lily.

Customize My Talking Cat Lily as you like.

Look after the hygiene of your virtual pet cat. Even though Lily is a cat, she adores taking a bath.

Talk to your virtual cat. Did you know she can repeat everything you say to her?

Feed your virtual pet cat with some of her favorite meals, made specially for Lily.

Play cool mini-games with Talking Cat Lily and win tons of coins you can spend  on stuff for your virtual Talking Cat Lily.

Pick the perfect outfit for Talking Lily, and make her look like a princes.

Take delight in gorgeous animations and graphics.

Hurry up and download My Talking Cat Lily game from the app store for free. Show off your lovely talking virtual pet.

Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lily.tallking.game

Our site: https://www.gravity-code.com/
